pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Premier of Quebec François Legault | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with Premier of Quebec François Legault to discuss the significant impacts of rail blockades, including goods shortages in Quebec and across Canada.

The two leaders agreed to continue the real-time exchange of information through the coordination committee they established last week.

Prime Minister Trudeau chaired the Incident Response Group meeting held earlier today to discuss infrastructure disruptions caused by blockades across Canada.

The two leaders also agreed on the importance of restoring operations on rail networks quickly, while ensuring that the situation is resolved in a peaceful manner.
